<template>
    <CreateCRUD :character = "char"></CreateCRUD>
</template>

<script>
// @ is an alias to /src
import CreateCRUD from '@/components/CreateCRUD.vue'

export default {
  name: 'CreateView',
  data() {
        return {
            char: Object
        };
    },
  components: {
    CreateCRUD
  },

  methods: {
    addNewCharacter(){
            console.log("addNewCharacter");
            let sendData = {name: "hola", descrip: "chau" };
            // this.char.push(sendData);
            this.char = sendData;
            console.dir(this.char);
        }
    },
}
</script>
